column4: anyone try using the newer nvidia drivers on their page or should i just stick with the v180 thats on the hardware drivers/envy
I'm on 185, it works great so far.
was it pretty easy to update? When i tried building previously i couldnt get x to start
I didn't know a thing about how to install it myself. My friend walked me through it...Basically I had to stop gdm, sh the driver file, start gdm.
